descriptionHtml:
It adds a healer companion, named Vilma, who will restore your health on the battles.
This is the first working version, I am going to add more features in the future.

----------
Features
----------
- A option in Vilma\'s dialogue to enable/disable the healing.
- Vilma will heal you (Fast Healing Spell=50 pt of more health for you =73 pt of magicka damage for vilma) when your health is low (25 %).  Then the magicka of Vilma diminish. The next healing will occur after her magicka recovering (min 73 pt). 
- Cool new armor for Vilma.
- It\'s a safe mod. No conflict with another mods or dirty refs.

-------------------
Where to find Vilma
-------------------
Outside Windhelm, below the bridge to the main door.
author: Runs
